# Interlude X: The Library of the Unlived {.unnumbered}

> "A sharp mind is a danger to its owner. It is better to use your intellect to build a library of unread potential than to risk the stress of a single new idea."
> 
> — *The Reverse Maven*

The intellectualization of avoidance. We will explore the "Cult of the Productivity Hack" and the "Library of Unread Books"—the sophisticated stagnation that allows you to feel brilliant while remaining safely stuck.
